modules.description: Provides functions for parsing, formatting, and manipulating text streams using lazy evaluation. Operates on strings, character sequences, and input/output channels. Enables efficient processing of large text files and real-time data transformation.

The module offers functions for validating, encoding, and manipulating UTF-8 strings, including case transformations, slicing, reversal, concatenation, and character-level operations like filtering and mapping. It enables tasks such as text normalization, data validation, and structured parsing through features like ASCII conversion, substring search, and pointer-based traversal. Specific use cases include processing multilingual text, ensuring encoding consistency, and preparing strings for downstream analysis or display.

Handles decoding of encoded data into a bigarray of unsigned 8-bit characters, using a provided decoder and specifying source and destination offsets. Performs encoding of code points into a bigarray, utilizing an encoder and defining the target position and size. Operates directly on bigarrays with a specific layout for efficient byte-level manipulation.

Provides functions to convert between different character encodings, including decoding byte sequences into code points and encoding code points into byte sequences. Operates on string representations of encodings, code points as integers, and decoder/encoder state objects. Recodes strings between encodings, processes partial input, and handles errors or incomplete data during encoding and decoding.
